name: One Step At A Time (SilentPixel)
description:
Making you with all the best features was nice...

Making you with Sentience though... was a mistake

You just want  to do you.....

That wasn't your purpose.

CONTROLS

WASD = Move

Spacebar = Jump

Time moves as you move.... To rewind, Go back (A or Left_Arrow)

Crouch to Stop it

Ok.... so the boss battle ended up being a Clusterf*** Dumpfire
